column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////And I haven't even begun to rave about the food. We weren't crazy hungry
column2: so we each got a steak
column3: a 6oz filet mignon and the 24oz prime bone in rib-eye
column4: and shared a side of elote style corn as per our waitress' recommendation. While the side dish was a bit underwhelming
column5: the filet mignon was cooked to perfection and had a wonderful taste
column6: while the rib-eye was really juicy
column7: with just the right amount of saltiness. By far two of the best steaks I have ever tasted.
